website_summaries.verdict: A popular pick among handprint kits, this quality product provides a beautiful frame alongside durable prints.
pros: Prints are mold free for durability and safety
Includes easy-to-follow instructions, as well as a smoothing roller for the plaster
Genuine glass assures a beautiful outcome
cons: A few buyers claimed that the clay cracks when the product is finished drying

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give less than one star. The clay was absolutely horrid quality. It comes in three packs so you must roll together and remove all fine lines and cracks with this small wood roller. Which I did. I followed the directions and the clay still cracked as it dried! So disappointed because this ruins the whole product.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Super cute at home idea. Clay/putty is much more moldable than I was expecting however I don’t have a clue how to make the surface smooth. No matter how much pressing initially, how much finger smoothing and how much rolling with the wooden dowel provided it’s like old person elephant skin. I guess I keeping it but it’s a sad display.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: You should also enclose in your instructions "Do Not Put ...
customer_reviews.text: You should also enclose in your instructions "Do Not Put IN A Breezy Area, Will Cause Cracking" I had mine where my air conditioner was slightly blowing on it an caused it to dry at a faster rat , THUS causing it to CRACK.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Adorable as well be forever treasured!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable keepsake. I got this for my 6 year old ad her dog who's terminal. We stamped her hand and her pups! Those two are bff's regardless. It's still drying but turned out great. The clay dries quickly so I recommend using the sellers olive oil trick. I didn't read that until after all was said and done. I redid it 3 times and still ended up with little ripples but that is from my daughter pushing (doubt this would happen with a sleeping baby). Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Green

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad date idea.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be fun to do this with my date, being out first date I wanted something memorable. Unfortunately, she had man hands and couldn't quite get all of her hand into the frame despite trying every angle possible. She felt bummed out about it so I thought I would make things better and lighten up the mood by throwing my stuffed lobster animal at her. SHE GOT PISSED AT STORMED OUT and said something about Seinfeld. WTF, I don't even watch Seinfeld. What does Jerry have anything to do with this? Oh well, at least I got a part of her handprint to remember her by,
customer_reviews.author: Koomba

customer_reviews.title: Family loves their gifts (made three of these to give out)
customer_reviews.text: I bought three and they came out great. The first one took the longest to do, just getting used to the clay. I found that for me, 3 minutes of kneeding was perfect. I originally tried 5 minutes and it caused the clay to very slightly dry (I was really kneeding it fast). You need patience when rolling the clay smooth. I found that the last few rolls of the roller should only have the slightest bit of pressure applied to really make things smooth. The family loves their keepsakes! Make sure to read and follow the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to purchase this because it such a great idea but I’m really dissapointed in the quality of the product. My frame had a paint bubble right on the front of the frame so I returned to get a replacement and it’s worse than the first. The paint has drip marks on the frame and it didn’t have the glossy finish like the first one. Seems they forgot to add that? Also smells very chemically. Such a let down. I tried to email the customer service and it just bounced back?! Will be returning through amazon. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dreamingtoinspire

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby keepsake
customer_reviews.text: My favorite keepsake of my baby to date. My only regret is not having it and doing the prints sooner. Get this before your baby is born so you can capture those little prints ASAP. I’ll be purchasing some for baby shower gifts because what mama wouldn’t want to capture those precious little fingers and toes?! Follow the directions, take your sweet time and make sure you clean your table or whatever surface you plan to do it on, because not only will we forever have our precious baby prints, but we’ll have some crap that was on our table that night too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to do with our grand daughter. We wanted to surprise her parents for Christmas. She was 4 months old and trying to put her hand in the clay was funny. But overall it is a good product worth the money and memories are made and preserved. Quality and having the color guards blue, pink or white is a nice touch. You can choice what you want or need and it comes shipped in a very sturdy box. The clay was easy to mold and the instruction video was very helpful. Sorry I do not have a picture but maybe when I go over my daughters house I will take a picture and submit one. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cracks in final product - disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to a a T and the final product was very disappointing. The material for the hand / foot prints was lumpy even after taking a lot of time smoothing it with the wooden roller, and when it dried there were several big cracks that weren't there before.
customer_reviews.author: Nishley

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again, bummed I bought 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: We were pretty disappointed with this. The instructions said to mix 3 separate clay packages together, there was only one. The clay was pretty sticky at first and then by the time you could get it smoothed out on the frame it was already drying on top. The little roller isn’t big enough to roll the clay without getting lines in the clay from it. Then when my baby’s foot was placed into it it cracked around the edges of the clay and kid of made ripples in the rest of it. Overall pretty unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: This clay is AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this photo frame. I love the idea of being able to save your child's handprint, or feet prints. However, when using the clay I pulled up the video on YouTube. I also followed the sheet instructions that were provided in the Box. The issue with the clay, is that it starts to dry within seconds after using the wooden roller to smooth it. Because it dried so quickly, I will forever have wrinkled feet prints and fist prints (baby is two months & wouldn't unclench her fists). Better clay could definitely be used. I'm so unhappy with the wrinkling of the clay.
customer_reviews.author: Father_of_Harley

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but had some issues. The tabs on the back that hold everything in, 2 of the 4 were broken/missing. They provide 2 mats, one white which was in the frame and in perfect condition and a reversible blue/pink. Would have liked the blue but since it was just in the box and not protected in any way it was torn and bent. Overall the product was good but because of those issues I had to knock off some stars. The item was great and they provide excellent instruction even if it doesn’t come out as beautifully because you have a figedty infant.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Corali

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Works for Pets Too
customer_reviews.text: We used this kit to take an impression of our dog's paw before we had to put him down. It was very easy to use and our dog didn't mind the clay at all. We bought kits from two different companies and this clay was much moister so it was easier to make smooth (although not easy to make perfect, as you can tell from the photo). We let ours dry for a week before assembling, just in case. So far, so good! It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Newsoul

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how this is so highly rated
customer_reviews.text: It was an absolute bust. Footprints barely showed up, felt like the "clay" was two hundred years old. Cracks were everywhere. It is just an overall disaster and complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: QwikF3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift
customer_reviews.text: The baby is not here yet so I have not seen the results of this unique gift. From the quality of the instructions and the apparent effort to supply everything to ensure a successful end result, I want to give this five stars. This really seemed to thrill the mother-to-be because all she listed on her baby registry were practical items and this one was a surprise that touched her heart.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Newton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, good seller
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in perfect condition. The packaging is attractive and would make a lovely gift for any expecting parents. Our older daughter is almost 2 years old albeit on the petite side (about 5th percentile) and we were able to fit her hand and foot in the frame with careful positioning. The clay leaves residue that is easily washed off immediately after making the prints. Shipping was prompt and would order from the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: don't buy!!! 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was awful to use. The clay was way too hard, so we had to press on hands and feet really hard to leave any imprint which vanished later on. Then, the whole thing got giant cracks all over it...having to replace the clay with inkmarks instead. Would give it less stars if possible...
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled Clay
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this item. It was packaged nicely and the frame looks great but the clay seemed dry. I followed the directions but when attempting to roll it out I couldn't get it smooth, looked more like wrinkled skin. I tried to contact the seller through the email provided on the card in the box and received a bounce back undeliverable. Update: company contacted me, stood behind their product, and made everything right. I will definitely recommend a company that puts their customers happiness first.
customer_reviews.author: Acidpoptart

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this purchase. It’s not like I can go back in time and retake the hand and footprint of my baby. The kickstand is loose and completely flattens when I try to set the frame on the table. The frame insert covers some of the clay, which I wasn’t aware of. Now when I put it all together, part of the print is covered. Also, the instructional video isn’t accurate. There’s only one packet of clay, not two.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy arm bracket on back- won’t stand up
customer_reviews.text: The arm on the back of the frame is so flimsy that the first one bent and completely broke off before I even used it. I returned it and they sent me another frame back- that one was the same. It was incredibly flimsy and hasn’t called all the way off yet but it will not even support the weight of the frame to stand it up! Also, the “clay” needs to be used IMMEDIATELY after rolling it out into the frame- use within seconds! I waited a minute or two and it had dried out quite a bit and made it hard to press baby’s hand and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Marco 222

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I did this kit for my newborn daughter and it turned out very nice. It looks neat and the instructions are simple. My only suggestion is to catch the prints when your baby is sleeping. The footprints are easy but handprints prove challenging. I had to wait for my baby to fall asleep and by the time she did the clay had started to dry ever so slightly. The handprint did not turn out perfect for this reason but I love it nonetheless. This would be a perfect shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us - clay is too hard
customer_reviews.text: This product just didn't work out for us. The clay was hard to use. You have to really press your little one's hands (or legs) to get an impression. We were just not able to do it. Part of it could be the reason that we just didn't have the heart to push a newborn's hands so hard. Presentation was great but I would never gift this to first time parents.
customer_reviews.author: Whinoceros

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea but poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these for Christmas presents and all 3 arrived with the back tabs either missing or broken. Therefore there is no way to secure it in the frame. I would have returned but thought it could be used as a plaque instead. And really liked the idea for Christmas. The clay was sticky like dough. I waited 5 days after for the clay to dry. I put it in the frame so it wouldn’t get messed up and somehow condensation still got in the frame. Will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Amazing Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to prepare and set the clay to get the handprint. We covered the clay/frame with a paper towel when finished, and placed it out of the way of any blowing air for the recommended four days and it came out perfect. There was a small issue with the first order, and the seller replied quickly and resolved the issue. Very happy with my purchase and would recommend this kit and seller.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: We had to buy another one as the first one cracked but this one came out great.
customer_reviews.text: this is the third purchase as one of the first purchase we did the clay ended up cracking so we had to order another one. this one came out good. The only problem is the flap in the back to hold the frame is kind of thin and so it broke so it won't support the picture so I will have to hang it. Otherwise it worked fine We have twin boys so we needed two but we bought three to make it work.. is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Vita Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so that my daughter could have her babies foot and hand prints to remember him, as we had found out that our grandson had complications and most likely not make it to full term. He was stillborn at 7 months of gestation and it was the best gift we could have given her to remember her baby. The nurse was very helpful in assisting me to get the prints before they took my grandbaby away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality clay
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this because the clay was so dry that even after prepping it according to specifications, it immediately started cracking upon drying. You can't really see baby footprints because you're too distracted by all the cracks in the clay. Sad!
customer_reviews.author: S S Minn

customer_reviews.title: Probably not worth your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. It was extremely hard to do. I even did it while by 1-2 month old was sleeping. Her hand print did not turn out that great. When I let it dry the clay cracked some and caught a few little fuzzes from just sitting there. . I assembled it and put it up in her room anyway. Then, I heard a noise from her empty room and went in and it fell over. The closures on the back are literally cardboard and two of them just snapped off. Disappointed, because I bought it as a keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Harder to do than anticipated. I even watched the video twice, added olive oil, tried to get all the little cracks out, and waited til my 4 month old was asleep. Still got small cracks in it and his footprint wasn't as deep as I would have liked. I recommend just using a copier to get their beautiful feet and purchasing a frame to put that and a picture in.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service with personalized email from seller with expert hints and tips for making the keepsake in the most efficient way. Appreciated the tip to make the foot and hand prints when baby is asleep and I included all the tips provided to the new mommy who will be using this. Condition of the box was perfect and ready for gift wrapping. Little Hippo really takes the extra steps to make sure you are happy with the product and I would highly recommend them for their attention to customer needs!
customer_reviews.author: E. Byrne-Smock

customer_reviews.title: Excited to Receive, Major Letdown in the End
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to receiving this product. Upon using it, I was extremely disappointed. I spent forever trying to roll the clay out and finally got it completely smooth, took my daughter's impressions, let it dry over the weekend and the entire thing was cracked so bad that you could barely tell what they were. I realize the instructions say you have to be patient with it but this clay appears to not be very good quality. I ordered 2 of these to give as Mother's Day gifts. Needless to say, I didn't give them as gifts as I was embarrassed by the final product.
customer_reviews.author: Aboilergirl

customer_reviews.title: Major Fail
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work. I read the instructions and carefully followed them. However, I ended up with wrinkles and cracks like so many others. That, plus the clay was kind of hard and so I really had to push my baby's feet/hands into it, which made him cry. You have to use a wooden dowel to smooth the clay into the frame, but the dowel was a few mm short, so there was a line along the outer perimeter of the clay. We threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: nacirema

customer_reviews.title: Great Value with Excellent Results!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased that this product now comes with glass instead of plexi/acrylic. We had an easy time working the plaster and getting it all put together. One thing that was a little confusing was the written directions made reference to multiple putty packets but the kit came with just 1 packet. Otherwise, we're very happy with how our little one's hand print and foot print came out!
customer_reviews.author: glortega

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We followed the directions to a T and we got sub par results. The clay cracked more and more as it dried making it difficult to see where the hand and foot prints were. On top of that the frame stand fell out as we were putting the thing down to dry. It looks like it has the cheapest hardware known to man where it kind of just snaps in. We will be returning. The only pros I can think of are: 1. Easy to follow instructions 2. Large surface for prints
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiley

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The important piece was broken. The peg to keep the frame together seems weak. Edit- I received an email from the seller that they will be sending a replacement. Very great customer service. The clay seems like a descent one. Changed the rating from one to three for the above reason. Yet the durability is questionable for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Clay was too difficult to work with
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I really tried our patience with this. The clay dried and cracked too quickly before we could get both prints finished, so we tried to smooth out again and re-do, but we were unable to make totally smooth. Bottom half of clay has drying lines on it. There were great tips and instructions included, but we were unable to pull it off smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: SarahG

customer_reviews.title: How could I not take 30s to write a review about this?
customer_reviews.text: Tim & Steph, this is such an amazingly thoughtful and beautiful gift that you allow us to give to others on your behalf. I gave this as a gift to a couple of friends who had the joy of bringing their first baby into the world and I've gotta say, this will probably the foundation of all the baby shower gifts I get to give in the future. Happy to report they had no issues with the clay drying too quick or anything as well. All good things!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use - one clay packet - push hand in, and spread. Super easy
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use - one clay packet - push hand in, and spread. Super easy Simple to use - one clay packet - push hand in, and spread. Super easy Simple to use - one clay packet - push hand in, and spread. Super easy Simple to use - one clay packet - push hand in, and spread. Super easy Simple to use - one clay packet - push hand in, and spread. Super easy
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: The idea is really cute, but it was really difficult to get a good handprint. It kept creasing when we would press her hand or foot into it. It also only came with 1 package of clay, and the directions said to mix 2 packages. But the one package I got filled the whole space and seemed like it was all we needed. I still used it and kept it, but I wasn’t super impressed with the quality of the imprint it gave us.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Clay!!
customer_reviews.text: The clay that is provided with this product was not easy to use and dried out quickly (particularly after adhering to the instructions which say to kneed the clay for more than three minutes). When pressing my baby’s hand into the clay, wrinkles formed all around the hand print in the clay and the clay cracked in the deeper parts of the handprint. After redoing the process, the clay would not mold together and the end result was that there were lines and wrinkles everywhere in the clay. The finished product looks horrible!! What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser123

customer_reviews.title: Best gift EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received it today, just in time to let it dry for Mothers day. Wonderfully easy and fun to put together. My baby Grandson is 9 months and this to be his gift to his mama for her first official Mothers day. Best gift ever. And I love that it's big enough for me to add things like a lock of his hair
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Filley

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase. I looked on amazon for a while for a handprint kit and really liked this one. I’m glad I picked this one. Very simple to make and instructions were very easy to follow. After the 4 days I left it to dry it looked great and felt solid. Word of advice try to have your baby asleep. The foot was easier to imprint l, I struggled a bit with her hand and you can see a little imperfection by the palm. Very happy though.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Valencia

customer_reviews.title: May only come with one pack and that’s fine
customer_reviews.text: First off I only got one packet and that’s all you need I was worried that it had came incomplete because the instructions say 3 packets. The 1 packet was enough clay. Second I tried doing this while my son was awake and it was difficult so yea do it while they are asleep. Third even though it was difficult to do while he was awake I can assure you that while I look at this clay print I will be able to look back and remember the little moment we had trying to get the prints made. I will be buying this again in the future for my future kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun DIY Keepsake
customer_reviews.text: OMG this was so much fun to put together! My baby has some chubby hands and feet, but it wasn’t a problem haha. I do recommend waiting until your baby is sleeping.... It makes a world of a difference. I bought the White frame and it looked exactly like the pics. Thanks for an awesome Keepsake! My heart strings are pulled each time I look at it. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Missing clay packets, and email not working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this back in February (it is now end of May) and unfortunately I just got around to opening and found that there is only 1 clay packet when it says there should be 3, and when I tried to email the info/help email address they provided it got shot back as undeliverable... dont know what to do with it now, and I was really hoping to use this for my baby girl! May have to just buy another one :/
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keepsake - did crack a little
customer_reviews.text: Love that we have captured our newborns hand and foot prints. I'm ok with the fact that it cracked a little while drying. Remember to push tiny hands and feet down more than you think you probably should to get a good print. Easiest to do this when the baby is asleep. The harder you are able to safety push the better the print.
customer_reviews.author: optiontrader

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it seems, but looks good at the end
customer_reviews.text: It could be a pretty good product with a couple of adjustments. the inside frame partially covers the imprint area. I had to cut it and you can see on the pictures by how much. The wooden roller to flat out the clay is smaller then the area. there should be 2 of them included and they should be exact size of the area needed to be flatten otherwise it leaves squeezed out areas. it became way bigger project i anticipated and not very convenient. I had to make 3 of those... The end product was pretty good and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Penn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on amazon and it came with a card to contact the seller before writing a negative review. The email provided bounced back. First attempt, the glass was broken, no fault to the product itself. Second attempt, I followed the instructions, however the clay dried out extremely quickly in which I could barely get the prints in. The clay would wrinkle when I pressed my baby’s hand/foot on it. The prints ended up barely noticeable, while the wrinkles were highlighted. Next time I may try the ink instead.
customer_reviews.author: swmk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, turned out great
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me and my mom for Mother's Day to use with our infant son. We did both kits easily and had an excellent experience with the whole thing. It took a little time to get the clay perfectly smooth in the frame, but that is to be expected and it didn't make us go crazy trying to get it absolutely flawless. I love this and absolutely love how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: A Franson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent new baby gift
customer_reviews.text: Hi: I purchased two of these for parents of new babies. I could not complete the easy to use and instruction ratings because I don't know, not having used your product myself. It looks wonderfully made and a great idea to capture the precious moment of a new baby's prints and photo. Best wishes for your continued success.
customer_reviews.author: Amfan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use this kit, everything arrived in perfect condition and the frame looks nice. Unfortunately, the result was not very impressive. About 2 hours later, the clay started cracking (picture attached). I don't think I will be using this frame, it simply doesn't look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dirty frame/crumbly clay
customer_reviews.text: I received the white frame with smudges on it. It looked like someone touched it with dirty fingers, including an orange spot almost like they’d been eating Doritos? I was able to wipe most off, but ew. Secondly, the clay is difficult to work with and dries super fast causing it to ripple when you’re trying to roll it flat in the frame. The clay also got crumbly and dry way too fast once it was rolled flat. I tried working in some olive oil as the directions suggest but it just didn’t turn out great. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Clay
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to try out this product. However, we were disappointed with the results when trying the instructions exactly as provided by the company. The clay was of poor quality. No matter how patient we were, the clay turned out wrinkled and then proceeded to crack more as it dried. The roller is not the exact size of the width of the clay area, so it would always leave a mark on the clay. No matter how much we rolled with patience, the product yielded far from perfect results. We've tried other products before, and this clay was not easy to work with. Great product concept, but highly disappointing results.
customer_reviews.author: Minhthe Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: good product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed making the little prints of my 2 week old son; I made them as a surprise gift for my wife and she was absolutely thrilled. The seller was very helpful and sent me a personal email with detailed instructions to make sure I did it right. If you don't follow the instructions, you can get disappointing results and I imagine a lot of the negative reviews had such an experience. For an average person who can follow directions, it's easy to use. The most important thing is to wait until your child is very very asleep!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: ... different brands of these and this one was the best! These are the ways it is superior to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought four different brands of these and this one was the best! These are the ways it is superior to other brands: the clay was nice and soft - the importance of this cannot be overstated. One cheap brand did not use the right packaging for the clay and it was all dried out, totally difficult to use. It uses real glass and the diresctions are well written and understandable to native English speakers! The frame is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Candice carr Kelman

customer_reviews.title: Highly not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The clay cracked in multiple places and the print doesn't look good. The wood stick included in the kit is too short to roll over the clay bed without leaving an additional groove. Stay away from this product due to its very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult but worthwhile memory
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get it to look good but still is a nice memory. Might be a good project to do with visitors while the baby is sleeping. I recommend doing this when the baby is still a newborn my 2.5 month old woke up from something cold touching her foot
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I bought this again for baby #2
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with how this looked for our baby #1 that I got this for baby#2. There is something very sentimental about seekng my baby’s little paw prints with a picture that I just cherish, and this product captures it so well the first time that I bought this again
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Clay cracked, wrong instructions for item sent.
customer_reviews.text: The info@littlehippo.com email does not work. Also the item did not get 3 packages of clay, as per the instruction, there was only one in the silver packet. we thought may be it is advanced and the instructions were not updated, we needed it and made the print. After making it smooth and taking the impression, and waiting for 3 days to dry, so unfortunately, the whole thing is cracking as you can see it in the attached picture. Very disappointed in the item. Time is running out for newborn prints for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: One pack of molding clay inside.
customer_reviews.text: I was confused because the instructions said to mix three packs of molding clay but when I opened the box, there’s only one pack. I bought two for my twins and both boxes contains one pack inside. Didn’t want to waste my babies precious time, by returning and waiting for new item, as they are growing so fast, and just did the one molding clay anyway. Still waiting for it to dry. Will update if it turned up alright
customer_reviews.author: Pia

customer_reviews.title: Lovely finished product
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product as far as the look of it. It’s super classy and easy to assemble. The one issue we had is that to get that perfect hand and foot print on the first try is nearly impossible even with our daughter dead asleep. She would immediately flinch from the coolness of the clay and bend in her fingers so we had to remold the clay multiple times before we were happy with the product. Maybe if some suggestions for what to do if you need to reset it would be helpful. Other wise the final product was great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Lackwood

customer_reviews.title: This handprint kit was very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my daughter-in-law for Mother's Day. I have a 15 month old grandson and this kit was very easy to use with him. I love how they supply letters that I could use to mold his name and date into the clay as well. Very nice and I'm hoping she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I've done a couple of these before but the clay on this kit dried out way too fast and resulted in wrinkles forming in the top when we did it imprints. I see other reviews mention bring instructed to add olive oil to the clay but my instructions so not say that. We made it for a gift so I don't really have time to re do it either.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: SO Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This comes out so beautiful once it dries. The frame is sturdy and the holder for the clay is well built. Once complete it is definitely a keepsake. Would make a great shower gift. It has one blue side and one pink so you can customize it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Baby handprint mold
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It looks as described. Quality. Pretty. Heard easy to use and nice. Haven’t actually seen after using. I hope to not need for a long time but imagine the molding material works great for pet paw prints too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This product was totally defective. the opening was not the right size for the clay area so that part of his footprint was obstructed. The stand for the frame was broken as well and wouldn't hold up the frame at all. I tried to contact the company and got no response. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: Well built quality frame
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for a baby shower gift. The box is sturdy and so is the picture frame. Seems to have complete instructions for the receiver and everything she will need I am sure she will be pleased and surprised. I can update and send a photo once she has the baby and uses the kit
customer_reviews.author: Joanne T

customer_reviews.title: Theres probably something better
customer_reviews.text: So mine came a little damaged. But that's where the clay goes so it's no big deal. The issues I have with this product are that it's too heavy to be hung by just the middle nail hook. It just swings. Also the stand is terrible and doesn't hold the frame up. But it does look really nice despite these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower present.
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions carefully, great gift. Finally, my son got this done for his baby. Really came out nice and they can put in updated pictures, one pic for when the foot and hand print was done and one for now. It makes a wonderful keep sake .
customer_reviews.author: M.R. Wiertel

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The frame was poorly stuck together, had to fix. The clay dried up faster than expected. Started cracking a bit while we were trying to get prints done. Otherwise happy with product. I like the choices of photo framing.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It was easy to use and I made a really great keepsake. The only downside is that the frame itself is a little bit cheap and the tabs holding the frame to the backing broke quickly. I’m going to have to reinforce it myself somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ross

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for the stand
customer_reviews.text: The video makes it seem super easy but it’s a little difficult to get it smooth. My main problem is that the frame is too heavy for the stand. I gave it to my boyfriend for a gift to put on his side table and after a couple of weeks I noticed it was slowly sinking down now the stand broke off and it can’t be fixed. So if you are hanging it on the wall it’s ok but unfortunately not great to place in a surface. That was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: J Silva

customer_reviews.title: The worked wonderfully we put the babies feet print in the center ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to create a special item for a family vacation to meet our grandchildren for the first time. The worked wonderfully we put the babies feet print in the center then used our thumbs to make hearts from my son and daughter-in-law and my husband and I. Turned out perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Vander Meer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product. Literally 10 minutes into putting it together, I regretted buying it. I’m pretty crafty and have worked with clay before. I still found it nearly impossible to get the clay “perfectly smooth” as the instructions direct you to do. The roller makes it even worse by adding ridges to the product. The frame itself is very nice, and I love the layout. The clay portion is terrible though, which was my only reason for buying it. :( I wanted to love it, I really did. Two stars is generous.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylan

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby gift Idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. She ABSOLUTELY loved it. She said the instructions were easy to follow and she has a memory of her little girl from when she was born. It’s hanging on the babies wall in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Frame is good i like how it turned out but giving clay a smooth shape is a bit harder than i expected. I know it is not perfectly smooth after rolling it and all but turned out good at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Clear instructions, with even the option of a video tutorial. I purchased two, one for each set of grandparents. I was able to get the "clay" ready in a matter of minutes and it held the imprint of my 5.5-month-old baby's hand and foot well with plenty of room. Unsure of how long it took to dry, since we did it at their houses and left it there. The frame also came with all 3 colors of backboard, which was nice so the grandparents got to choose.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. The clay quality was way to elastic so if we got a good print it would shrink up so you couldn’t see it right. Very hard to smooth out, and to top it off the piece of the back to hold the frame up is broke.
customer_reviews.author: SJAY

customer_reviews.title: Great Memory
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter for her baby. She said it was pretty easy to use. She liked the frame and you can add pictures of the baby. It makes a very nice gift that everyone can enjoy. Its a great memory.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for new parents!
customer_reviews.text: Amidst all the things that new parents need to stock a nursery, it's easy to overlook a special gift like this framed keepsake kit; but the new parents who received this gift were overjoyed! It is a lovely reminder a very important activity for their to do list...and a nice variation from socks, diapers, and sleepers.
customer_reviews.author: patty durkee

customer_reviews.title: It's a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought if for my son and daugher-in-law for a gift for their "gender reveal" party. They loved it. I shouldn't really say anything about the durability, assembly or how easy it is to use since I didn't actually open it and check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit overall. The instructions were easy to use but I didn’t really think it dried well since it has some cracking and I followed the directions very closely. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy , drys quick ,and came out beautiful! So happy I was able to get my little mans foot print for a lifetime . Definitely a great buy and the frame looks beautiful when it all done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cesarano

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Love the idea of having prints forever.
customer_reviews.text: Such a sweet keepsake. This is so adorable. Now I'll have his tiny had and foot print in clay forever. Was difficult to get the clay perfectly smooth without any cracks. But I still have the prints so I don't even care. I think I may have pushed his hand and foot to deep because I ended up with wrinkles in the clay. But still cute. Frame is good quality. Easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product, inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is supposed to come with three separate pieces of clay, according to the instructions. So either the instructions are wrong and need to be updated or the seller didn’t include all of the requisite parts needed because I only received a single piece of clay. I tried to work with it but mine turned out like many of the featured photos, lumpy, wrinkly and with big cracks. Complete waste of money and doesn’t work like it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: natasha galvez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video, followed instructions to the letter, and read other reviews to make sure mine turned out perfect.... it’s all wrinkly around the prints, very disappointing. Won’t be ordering any more of these as I had planned to buy 12 to make a big keepsake wall for each month. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: FurBabyMama

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not good. Recieved broken frame once.Returned and ordered again & 2nd one was also broken.Still gave it a shot,but clay color is not white after it sets out.It is a muddy color with lot of cracks(we tried olive oil as well).This turned out to be a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for new parents!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase! This company makes fine quality gifts and they don’t disappoint! Love the frame and clay molding. Follow directions and it will work out just fine for you! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for new parents
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my son and daughter in law on the birth of their first baby. They loved it! The email followup you sent with extra tips was very helpful. Thank you so much. Highly recommended! Great gift for new parents.
customer_reviews.author: janistreb

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute, the clay is cracky
customer_reviews.text: The clay is almost not moist enough...By the time you get it flattened out the surface is drying a bit. Also, the directions dont match up. They say there are multiple bags of clay and there is only one.
customer_reviews.author: K Rose.

customer_reviews.title: In overall it's great, but the process is hard
customer_reviews.text: It's very very hard to get an excellent result, first of all, because a baby is moving. The instruction recommends to do it when a baby sleeps, but even then the baby has reflexes and they are triggered with the light touch! I did about 10 trials with 5-min kneading from the very beginning after each. Ironically, the best result was achieved when the baby got awake. Second, knead it thoroughly. Very thoroughly. It has to be very very homogeneous. Finally, I've got a very good result which makes me happy, but it was not easy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Valentin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! it really looks the best when babies asleep. I have twins and the first print we did awake...bad idea. When babies are asleep it turns out much better...less squirming. I do have some wrinkles in mine but it still looks great. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: chad baird

customer_reviews.title: Clay Cracked Even When Following Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Had a good experience with the seller, but horrible issues with the clay in this product. I watched the instructional video and read the instruction, and followed them EXACTLY. Despite rolling out the clay perfectly smooth, the clay started to dry as it rolled (within 5 minutes!) and began to crack. It cracked even more when we made the baby's hand and footprints. We were planning to give these frames as gifts but they aren't fit to give to anyone - really very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: The clay was not easy to get smooth regardless of the instructions. I gifted it and the back holder of the frame broke within days. Cute idea but wasn’t the best quality. Packaging was nice however.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Babies hate this and you will too
customer_reviews.text: After 20+ minutes struggling with the clay (which won’t roll out “flat” as shown in the pictures) I spent another 20+ minutes struggling with an uncooperative baby. Some babies move their hands and feet constantly, even in sleep, so it’s not possible to get a good impression. This was a total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Barton

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This little frame is adorable! I love that you have the option of different colored dividers too. This was a gift for my daughter and son-in-law and they will cherish the memories of getting our little girl’s hand and foot prints in the clay. It’s a very precious keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: KimmyZ

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video- get some help- hands are hard!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for all of the grandparents to give as Christmas gifts & one for ourselves! Getting the footprints was easy, the handprints were HARD- luckily it’s easy to re-roll the dough if needed or even fix blemishes on messed up areas. The instructional video online is super helpful. It took 3 people to get decent handprints so make sure you have someone to assist if possible! Great kit!!! Hopefully all of the grandparents appreciate how hard this was to accomplish! <3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun product, great seller communication, cute keepsake
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, bought 3 for mothers day to give to my wife, mom, and grandma. They had a great time making them although our new born didn't seem to feel the same way lol. Clay can be a bit tricky and should be kneaded very well. We did end up needing to use a little olive oil and would recommend maybe a 1/4 tsp or just a drop or 2 when kneading cause the drying process can create cracks without it. Would Highly Recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Not enough molding to get a good flat service and the roller doesn’t help at all
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video and still had no luck getting this product to work as advertised. Not enough molding to get a good flat service and the roller doesn’t help at all. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Baby Handprint Kit |NO Mold| Baby Picture Frame, Baby Footprint kit, Perfect for Baby Boy Gifts,Top Baby Girl Gifts, Baby Shower Gifts, Newborn Baby Keepsake Frames
feature_bullets: ✅⚡LOWEST PRICE OF THE YEAR!⚡ BONUS COLOR INSERTS! CREAM, WHITE, BLUE & PINK! A gift that will be cherished for a life: If you’re looking for a thoughtful gift that will light up your friends heart, a baby clay handprint kit is the perfect choice. This adorable kit comes complete with 3 packs of non-toxic white clay, mini rolling pin, handpainted wood frame, double sided tape & easy instructions. Your beautiful frame keeps gifting sweet little moments forever.

✅UNLIKE OTHER HANDPRINT KITS: When the clay dries on your frame it shrinks slightly – this is normal. On OTHER frames you’re often left with an unsightly brown background. Added to this, was flimsy acrylic that goes cloudy over time. This isn’t good enough. So we’ve made sure your frame is up to the highest quality standards. Your frame has a seamless white transition, and is 100% Real Glass. Oh and almost forgot to mention: Unlike other frames, ours has no exposed wood making it MOLD FREE!

✅A GENTLE MOMENT OF CREATION: It won’t be long before they’re all grown up and on their way. So take a moment now, capture their little handprint, to remind you of their newborn days. For the perfect still memory, wait until bubs is sleeping in a peaceful moment, then take your print. Simple to follow instructions will guide you step by step. Your precious creation will be assembled in under 10 minutes, and ready for proud display.

✅CAPTURE YOUR ADORABLE FUR-BABY ALSO! There’s nothing more precious than seeing your infant grow up alongside your beloved family pet. Instead of buying a separate paw print kit, you can imprint your baby’s handprint, alongside your pet’s pawprint. The non-toxic clay is perfectly safe to use on all pets. Finish off your keepsake frame with an adorable photo of your child and their loveable furry pal.

✅USA-BASED COMPANY, LITTLE HIPPO QUALITY GUARANTEE: Securing your newborn memories is our greatest pleasure. Thank you for trusting your precious moments with Little Hippo. Unlike cheaper products, our kits are designed in the US, and made to last! We guarantee the high quality and 100% confident you will be delighted. If anything happens in the first 12-months, let us know immediately! We’ll send you a replacement or full refund. Order Now, Capture The Moment.
